titleStmt.title: One warning more to the Baptists before their day be wholly spent and the night cover them ... : with a short answer to a book of Matthew Coffin's one of their teachers ... intituled Faith in Gods promises the saints best weapons : with many queries also for them to answer ... / written by one that hath sat under those shadows with them but hath now found the day in which all shadows fly away, Humphery Wolrich.
titleStmt.author: Wollrich, Humphry, 1633?-1707.

titleStmt.title: One warning more to the Baptists before their day be wholly spent and the night cover them ... : with a short answer to a book of Matthew Coffin's one of their teachers ... intituled Faith in Gods promises the saints best weapons : with many queries also for them to answer ... / written by one that hath sat under those shadows with them but hath now found the day in which all shadows fly away, Humphery Wolrich.
titleStmt.author: Wollrich, Humphry, 1633?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Pages stained, some print illegible.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
